definition[0]: if something repels you, it is so unpleasant that you do not want to be near it, or it makes you feel ill
definition[1]: to make someone who is attacking you go away, by fighting them
example[1]: The army was ready to repel an attack.
definition[2]: to keep something or someone away from you
definition[3]: if two things repel each other, they push each other away with an electrical force
example[3]: Two positive charges repel each other.
